Because they cannot longer live the life they are living, because they have debts they cannot repay, because everything they cared about is lost (this covers a conspicuous number of things), because their life does not have that much of an importance.. these are some of the things that could pass through the mind of people that are trying to kill themselves.. oh, then there are religious deaths, people that believe that suicide for the cause give them a better after life.
Because they don't care and we can approximate that everyone is on Facebook.. it's easy to find people, friends, people to spy on ;p

Nah, will probably just halve the Earth population at most but extinction, I don't think so, also because we are starting Mars colonization in the next years and if people that go there is healthy then the virus won't get a chance to hit that hard :)


This.... one of the many reasons because It's important we focus on other planets colonization. Extinction is now an if, it's a when.

I also add an inspiring video about the "[It's already too late](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z3EQqjn-ELs)" of Elon Musk

I would anyway never use `127.0.0....` also because they could use another port or address than you :)

for the outside you should use a proxy and the address for pages can start after the port, i.e. skip `localhost:43330` and start with `/ZJSGH[....]`

let's say you want to link to zeropolls, you do omitting the localhost part like this: [/ZeroPolls.bit](/ZeroPolls.bit) instead of [localhost:13254/ZeroPolls.bit](localhost:13254/ZeroPolls.bit/) which could not work for everyone.

within ZN I instead share my ZeroMe username@address.bit where I added my zites on the infobox ^^

[People](/ZeroPolls.bit/?Poll:1-1KihcBqcwgH1TKeZtKRnocUr22oUb5Av5A) think they are weak, I also think it, we are not that strong, a tiny virus can decimate or even extinct us.. The micro are stronger than the macro.

I think you don't have downloaded the Hub they are in :)
some people are in really uncommon hubs with a few people inside.. You could also create an Hub of yours if you want, of course... other people would have the same problem you have :)

[Here](/0hub.bit) a list of some Hubs, download a couple of them and see if you can find the people you are looking for ;)

and [Here](/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/12h51ug6CcntU2aiBjhP8Ns2e5VypbWWtv/1LCkoyzpbWmnhyGVHweGBPjryg1vxmh5hq/1602306015) a conversation about hubs :)
